title: Clan Rankings & New Skins & Community Skins

description: Added clan leaderboard based on power, active members, total games won, total kills, and total score
Clan leaderboards refresh daily and weekly. There's also an all-time leaderboard
Clan power is the sum of the levels of the active members in a clan (played at least one match within the leaderboard time period)
When you click on the leaderboard tab, you will randomly navigate to either the clan leaderboards or the CTG leaderboards
Added Fade (Dynamic) artifact collection to crates
Added new sprays to crates: Ghost, Text - OK (by EDEX), Light bulb (by EDEX), Punching glove
Added Burst Shotgun - Comic Poop (by EDEX)
Added Burst Shotgun - Frankenstein (by EDEX)
Added Magnum Pistol - Tarot (by Ukrainian_sniper)
Added Tactical Assault Rifle - Sweet (by Akmi-go)
Added Burst Shotgun - Vaporwave (by KillGG)
Updated crate rotations
Community skins will be added to the game if they: 1. Use original art assets 2. Fit the style of voxiom (cartoon-ish)
Fixed chat scrolling
Experimental: Fixed IP bans
Experimental: Changed new UI's color theme

title: Kill Feed Icons, Better Mobile Control, and various Improvements

description: Feature: Added gun kill feed icons
Shop: Added neon and stripes skin to Elite Assault Rifle
Mobile Control: Added item stack splitting by long-pressing on item slots
Mobile Control: Added tooltips display
Mobile Control: Simplified item management with drag-and-drop and tap-to-swap
Mobile Control: Improved crafting support
Mobile Control: Made guns automatically aim when you shoot
Mobile Control: Added full-screen support
Mobile Control: Made workstation recipes tab scrollable
Mobile Control: Fixed shovels sometimes stuck on mining
Mobile Control: Changed chat and battle royale stats layout so they don't block the virtual joystick
Bug Fix: Fixed chat scrolling
Bug Fix: Hopefully fixed a bug causing item switching to be unreliable
Battle Royale: Increased guns spawn rate in chests again. They are back to what they were before the nerf
Shop: Updated crate contents
Market: Extended item listing period from 7 days to 14 days
Experimental: IP bans
Experimental: Testing a new user interface (currently accessible only to developers)

title: Mobile Control, Dynamic Skins, and Improvements

description: Experimental: Added mobile controls
Fixed account item buttons on loadout/market page
Made Vector Space skins dynamic and animated, the animation direction and speed depends on the seed of each gun
Updated crate contents
View distance can be adjusted in settings. Lowering view distance greatly improves FPS but puts you at a disadvantage, as others can see you before you can see them.
In Capture the Gems, fixed an issue where gems are permanently destroyed in lava. They will properly respawn now.
Fixed spawn blocking in survival
Reduced floating block physics range
Limited maximum fluid block updates to 1000 per tick
Increased gun drop rate in Battle Royale
Slightly reduced Heavy Sniper Rifle's damage
Removed level requirement for Survival
Fixed player report menu incorrectly including clan tag as part of the player name

title: Anti Block Xray and Bug Fixes

description: Experimental: Added anti block xray to survival. Let me know if you encounter any issues!
Fixed item merge animation bug
Fixed "Find a new game" button
Fixed missing map name in battle royale match history
Added crafting recipe for making wood out of inferno log
Added crafting recipe for making inferno bricks out of inferno rocks
Reverted to the old auto-step physics; the new one made building stairs too difficult

list.subtitle: Battle Royale
description: Added classic BR map: Lost Temple. It's randomly generated!
The previous BR map is named as "Castaway".
Added map name in battle royale match stats
Decreased spawning rate of guns in chests to make the game more interesting

list.subtitle: Capture The Gems
description: Added new CTG map: Inferno - Watch out and don't fall into lava!
Added Lava, Inferno Rock, and Inferno Bricks
Added Inferno Logs and Inferno Leaves
Cleared water and lava near and inside team castles

list.subtitle: Improvements & Bug Fixes
description: Server and client desyncs are handled more smoothly
Fixed an issue where digging down causes small teleportation due to lag
Added an animation for item merging
Improved auto-step: Stepping up a block and vaulting should feel much more seamless
Removed Christmas decorations
Removed limited time Christmas cozy and frosty sets from crates
Updated crate contents
Fixed Heavy Sniper Rifle's Vintage Blossom skin. Variant B was misclassified as variant C due to a bug.
Updated YouTube Content Creator list
Fixed swimming sfx not playing when under water / lava
Fixed fluid transparency render order
Fixed Elite Assault Rifle's visual glitch causing the the gun's aim down sight to appear not as accurate

list.subtitle: Shop
description: Added a special VIP rank to the shop - Check the shop for more details!
Fixed an issue where in some cases interstitial ads still show up for players who have purchased gems
Added an upgrade button in the loadout station. You can watch an ad to boost the loadout station's items to Uncommon.

Players who have already purchased gems before this update will continue to enjoy an ad-free experience. However, for new players, buying gems will no longer remove ads in-game. Purchasing the VIP rank will be the only way to remove ads going forward.
Fixed a typo in Tactical Assault Rifle's name
Fixed Elite Assault Rifle's magazine size
Fixed Elite Assault Rifle's crouching ADS spread
Added a fix for mouse teleportation bug and improved mouse input precision
New gun: Elite Assault Rifle - It has powerful shots but slow firing rate
Added Christmas limited edition skins (Cozy and Frosty set)
Added snowing effects to the home page
New crates rotation
Anti-cheat update
Banned players can no longer use the market
Increased market listing fee to 15%
To prevent market abuse, each item can only be listed for 7 days instead of permanently
Anti-cheat update
New crates rotation
Increased to Capture The Gems AFK Kicker timer to 3 minutes
Fixed pull-back teleportation glitch due to long internet freezes
Patched speed hacks
Improved hitbox and lag compensation so that getting hit behind walls should occur less frequently
If you have a score of 0 at the end of a CTG game, you no longer receive 100 score for winning
Added AFK Kicker to Capture The Gems

list.subtitle: Balance Update
description: Decreased Light Submachine Gun's damage by 3
Increased Surge Assault Rifle's damage by 2
Increased Surge Assault Rifle's fire rate by 0.1 seconds
Decreased Surge Assault Rifle's reload time by 0.1 seconds
Removed flowing water physics and brought back infinite water physics to reduce lag
New covert skin rotations

list.subtitle: Bug Fixes
description: Fixed a spawn blocking exploit causing servers to freeze

list.subtitle: Custom Servers
description: Custom servers are now in alpha test for level 60+. This requirement will be decreased gradually.
The server creator can remove players from their custom server with /remove <player_name>
The server creator can deny players from entering their custom server with /deny <player_name>
The server creator can undeny players from entering their custom server with /undeny <player_name>
The server creator can change the sky color with /setskycolor <color_hexcode>
The server creator can change the gravity with /setgravity <gravity>
The server creator can change the fall damage multiplier with /setfalldamagemultiplier <fall_damage_multiplier>
The server creator can change the weapon damage multiplier with /setweapondamagemultiplier <weapon_damage_multiplier>
The server creator can shutdown the server with /shutdown
More customizations, map saving, and clan servers will come in future updates
Custom servers shut down after 10 minutes of inactivity (no players online) or after 24 hours
No XP is earned on custom servers
Each eligible player may only have 1 custom server running at the same time

list.subtitle: Shop
description: Added 17 new sprays: Squirrel, Panda, Duck, Silly Face, Angry Face, Surprised Face, Crown, Text - Yep, Text - Nope, Text - Haha, Watermelon, Lemon, Pillow, Thumbs Up, Thumbs Down, Question Mark, and Exclamation Mark
Added 3 new skins: Metallic, Terracotta, and Vintage Blossom (5 variants)
Removed various skins in the crates to make the rest of the skins easier to obtain. Skins in crates will be on rotation.

list.subtitle: Bug Fixes
description: Improved anti-cheat
Removed water buckets and fixed various water related bugs that caused lag

list.subtitle: Battle Royale
description: The toxic fog now closes all the way
Added a cap to survival xp per game
Reduced max players per game to 50

list.subtitle: Bug Fixes
description: Fixed sprays turning blue when far away

list.subtitle: Sprays
description: Added 19 sprays obtainable from crates!

list.subtitle: Skins
description: Added new magnificent collection: Neon

list.subtitle: Clans (Phase 1)
description: Phase 1/3 of clans is here! Clan creation and management is now available
If you are level 20 or above, you can create a clan with 1000 vox gems
Each clan can have up to 50 players
There are 4 roles within a clan, members, soldiers, officers, and commander
Soldiers can contribute scores in clan wars, officers can promote/demote members/soldiers, and the commander is the creator of a clan
The minimum level to join a clan is level 10. However, clan commanders can choose to increase their clan's level requirement
There are 3 recruitment modes available for each clan: open, accepting applications, and invite only
If a clan is open, it is available to anyone who meets the requirement
If a clan is accepting applications, anyone who meets the requirement can apply, but the request must be approved by the commander
If a clan is invite only, players can only be invited to the clan by the commander
Clan tags are 2-4 character tags visible beside your name in game
Please report any bugs as soon as possible so we can get them fixed! Assemble your clans and get ready for clan wars in phase 2 :)

list.subtitle: New Skins
description: Added new magnificent skin - Light Submachine Gun - Blueprint
Added new magnificent skin - Burst Shotgun - Comic Pop (4 variants)
Added new covert skin - Light Sniper Rifle - Vaporwave

list.subtitle: New Skins
description: Added new artifact skin - Heavy Sniper Rifle - Invictus
Added new magnificent skin - Surge Assault Rifle - Caution
Added new magnificent skin - Strike Pistol - Circuits
Added new precious skin collection - Safari
We will be hosting some skin giveaways in Discord! Join to participate!

list.subtitle: Friends
description: Friend system is live for players level 5 and above!
You may send a friend request to any player. If the player accepts your request, the friendship is formed!
You may have up to 100 friends
You will be able to see which servers your friends are playing on (Survival and Capture the Gems only)

list.subtitle: Trophies
description: People who are on 1st-3rd place of the score-based leaderboards will have a trophy beside their names in chat
If you are on multiple leaderboards, multiple trophies will be shown

list.subtitle: Skins and Crates
description: Temporarily reduced ultimate crate to 300 vox gems!

list.subtitle: Buckets and Water
description: Buckets are now craftable in survival (50 iron)
Water no longer floats in air. A water source block drops if there is no support under it.

list.subtitle: Player Market
description: Various price history chart improvements
Market listing fee is increased to combat abuse
Increased market listing fee to 10% and minimum fee to 1 vox gems

list.subtitle: Player Market
description: Player markets are now open for players level 15 and above!
You may list up to 5 weapons at the same time
A 5% non-refundable listing fee is charged for each listed weapon
A detailed price history is also available to view for each item type

list.subtitle: Settings
description: Add 2 new settings to help reduce lag
Show bullet tracers - whether bullet tracers should be visible
Show ammo shells when firing - whether ammo shells should be visible when firing a weapon

Artifact -> 1000 Vox Gems

Bomb blocks can be harvested with shovels/hands
Bomb blocks can be detonated if shot with guns
Bomb blocks do not damage blocks if detonated in water
On detonation, players get damaged, inactive bomb blocks get activated, and active bomb blocks get pushed away

title: Introducing Weapon Skins and Vox Gems!

list.subtitle: Weapon Skins
description: Weapon skins are now available to purchase and collect!
In this initial release, there are more than 200 skins with around 28 patterns
Each skin pattern you obtain is unique, which means that even if someone obtained the same skin as you did, the patterns will look different
You can obtain weapon skins through opening crates, please see the Shop for more details
Weapon skins are equippable in your Account Loadouts

list.subtitle: Vox Gems
description: Vox Gems is the official in game currency of Voxiom
You earn 1 vox gem for every 100 XP in Capture The Gems or Battle Royale
You can claim additional free vox gems (10-30) by watching a short video ad every hour if you complete a match during that time period (The popup can be disabled in the General Settings section)
More ways to earn vox gems are coming very soon, stay tuned for giveaways on our Discord!

list.subtitle: Voxiom Studio
description: Voxiom Studio is the official tool for quickly viewing and testing Voxiom skins
Feel free to explore the possibilities. However, for a skin to be added to the game, it MUST go through the submission process and be approved by our staff and the community on Discord

list.subtitle: Bug Fixes

list.subtitle: Chests!
description: Chests are storage blocks where you can store your items
Wooden chests have 4 slots, iron chests have 8 slots, and golden chests have 12 slots
When a chest is destroyed, all of its items are dropped
Wooden chests are craftable anywhere using 50 wood
Iron chests are craftable in the work station using 20 iron and 5 emeralds
Golden chests cannot be crafted, but they can be found underground in the sandbox mode!

A timer tick sound is played near the end of a game

description: A timer tick sound is played before game starts and before each toxic fog approaches

description: Fixed inventory input prediction in certain situations
Player inventory slots are properly cleared visually on death
Respawn screen are now hidden when game ends / server disconnects
Added confirmation prompt to prevent players from accidentally leaving the game
Leaving the game through the game menu redirects you to the home page

list.subtitle: Free For All Test Server
description: Optimized map to reduce lag
Optimized UI to reduce lag
No longer has a 300 points cap, the winner is determined when the timer runs out
Improved server loading time (when the server resets, it should come back online much quicker than before)
You can access the server here

list.subtitle: Sandbox Test Server
description: Added tree planting!
To grow a tree, drop red berries or orange berries on a grass/dirt block and wait 1-1.5 minutes (timer is random)
Red berries grow red berry trees, and orange berries grow orange berry trees
The more berries in the dropped item stack, the more berries the grown tree will produce
There must be enough space around the dropped berries for the tree to grow
Players/dropped items cannot be too close to the tree for the tree to grow
You can access the server here

list.subtitle: Free For All Test Server
description: New game mode is available for beta testing!
Everyone is your enemy! First to 300 points wins!
Brand new custom built map!
Match duration is 10 minutes. When timer runs out, players with the highest score win!
Stats are not tracked during this beta test
You can change your loadout in your inventory as long as you do not move after you spawn/respawn
You can access the server here

list.subtitle: Sandbox Test Server
description: Added AFK kicker (kicked if you don't move for 10 minutes)
You can access the server here

list.subtitle: Bug Fixes
description: Dead bodies should no longer prevent block placement
Fixed item not being refunded if item drop is cancelled
Fixed block not being refunded if block placement in water is cancelled
Fixed gun icons sometimes being invisible

list.subtitle: Sandbox Server
description: Added server reset voting system
The server resets every 24 hours, but you can use /delay to delay the reset or /hurry to shorten the timer every hour
You can access the server here

list.subtitle: Miscellaneous
description: Chat dialog should no longer break lines in the middle of a word
Teammates should no longer be able to cancel your healing
Players should no longer be able to cancel your healing in spawn

list.subtitle: Sandbox Server
description: Increased number of spawns to 4
Added snow biome
You can access the server here
You no longer need to click play to join the sandbox

list.subtitle: Miscellaneous
description: Added ambient occlusion and better lighting to all gun models
Added an outline to player cursors on the minimap
Increased movement speed of light sniper rifle
Increased movement speed of heavy sniper rifle

list.subtitle: Sandbox Server
description: An experimental sandbox server where stats are not tracked
No time limit, but server might get restarted anytime without notice
PVP is enabled
You can access the server here (click play)

list.subtitle: Miscellaneous
description: Fixed ammo count and hand model not updating when you switch between items of the same type
Added ambient occlusion to Surge Assault Rifle models (it should look prettier)
Decreased shovel damage. Low-tier shovels were too powerful
Fixed camera shaking rapidly when you win a match
Fixed camera not panning towards death source when you get eliminated in battle royale
Fixed a visual glitch that made health bar not going to 0 when you die
Fixed requiring an extra xp point to level up for each level
Greatly increased player damage of shovels
Fixed not able to chat while waiting for respawn
Fixed "Using items" dialog getting stuck on the screen when you get killed during item consumption
Crosshair is now hidden as soon as you scope in
Removed delay between sniper shots and non-sniper shots. However, the delay between sniper shots of different snipers remains
Fixed a glitch causing you to play 2 matches simulatenously
Fixed the delay when switching from normal sensitivity to scope/ads sensitivity
Fixed a DNS issue that caused some servers to become unreachable

list.subtitle: Capture The Gems
description: Added light sniper rifle to loadout station
Added heavy sniper rifle to loadout station
Removed chests on towers

list.subtitle: Map
description: Increased sulfur ore spawn rate

list.subtitle: Weapons and Items
description: Added light sniper rifle: low recoil, decently accurate while moving, decent damage
Added heavy sniper rifle: high recoil, accurate only when standing still, high damage
Added sulfur ores
Added sniper rifle ammo

list.subtitle: Matchmaking
description: Once in a Capture The Gems match, you are able to copy and share the url to your friends, and they can join instantly
If you used an invalid match invite url, you will be assigned to another match randomly

list.subtitle: UI
description: Enabled chat in Battle Royale

list.subtitle: Map
description: Added sulfur ores in Battle Royale and Capture The Gems
Added bronze chests, silver chests, and golden chests in Capture The Gems. They only drop snipers

list.subtitle: Crafting
description: Ammos can now be crafted with iron, emerald, and sulfur

list.subtitle: Physics
description: You can no longer ADS/scope when reloading and switching items

list.subtitle: Settings
description: Added ADS Sensitivity Multiplier: Allows you to change the sensitivity multiplier when you are aiming down sights. Defaults to a 1:1 approximated ratio between hip fire and ADS in terms of number of pixels moved

Added Scoped Sensitivity Multiplier: Allows you to change the sensitivity multiplier when you are scoped in with a sniper. Defaults to a 1:1 approximated ratio between hip fire and scoped in terms of number of pixels moved
Added Sniper Scope Image URL: Allows you to change the scope image
Added Sniper Scope Image Opacity: Allows you to change the scope image's opacity
Added Sniper Scope Image Scale X: Allows you to change the scope image's horizontal scale
Added Sniper Scope Image Scale Y: Allows you to change the scope image's vertical scale
Added Sniper Scope Background Color: Allows you to change the scope's background color
Added Sniper Scope Background Opacity: Allows you to change the scope's background opacity

list.subtitle: UI
description: Fixed matchmaker error message overflow
Added some ad banners in various places

list.subtitle: Free For All
description: Started working on Free For All game mode! Open Beta will be released soon. Keep an eye on this page 👀

list.subtitle: UI
description: Reverted UI scaling change

list.subtitle: UI
description: Added some ad banners
Optimized UI scaling so that game hud elements wouldn't overlap

list.subtitle: Stats
description: Added scores leaderboard!
Leadeboards are now sorted by scores by default
Match stats show scores
Players are sorted by score in a CTG match page
Ineligible CTG matches are no longer counted in match history and leaderboards (a match is considered ineligible if you have neither earned score nor died)

list.subtitle: Spray
description: You can now spray (default key is T) on blocks

list.subtitle: Modding
description: Custom textures are applied to block icons

list.subtitle: Bug Fixes
description: Fixed stationary entities are sometimes invisible

list.subtitle: Respawn
description: Respawning is no longer automatic and must be manually triggered
Bigger and animated respawn text
"Pick up items" prompt no longer shows when you are dead

list.subtitle: Settings
description: UI redesign
Settings are now saved automatically
Added a modding section that allows you to use custom block textures

list.subtitle: Bug Fixes
description: Fixed muted players being able to talk in match chat

list.subtitle: Magnum Pistol
description: Added the Magnum Pistol, a powerful single shot pistol with high recoil

list.subtitle: Strike Pistol
description: Increased clip size to 12

list.subtitle: Loadout Station
description: You can now select your primary and secondary loadouts separately
Loadout preferences are saved

list.subtitle: View Models
description: Lightings on first person gun models are now always coming from the same direction for more consistent visuals

list.subtitle: Match History
description: Added match history in player profiles (up to 10 past matches)
Added detailed match log page
Example match history page: https://voxiom.io/player/ThriveR
Example BR match: https://voxiom.io/match/br/f3df16a4-5ed5-4f6d-b266-7ed78e66b835
Example CTG match: https://voxiom.io/match/ctg/5fc4c09c-ac73-4da7-8f15-0f78f7c6dc12

list.subtitle: Leaderboards
description: Added daily and weekly leaderboards
Weekly leaderboards reset every Sunday at 0am PST
Daily leaderboards reset every day at 0am PST
Leaderboards are updated every 5 minutes
Better time string conversion

list.subtitle: Bug Fixes
description: Fixed another wall clipping xray glitch

list.subtitle: Capture The Gems
description: Number of total games count is only increased if you have either died, killed an enemy, or captured a gem
You will no longer be placed into a game that is almost finished (if either team has a score >= 50)

list.subtitle: Bug Fixes
description: Fixed dead players blocking bullets
Fixed getting "You can't damage players in their spawn!" randomly

list.subtitle: Chat
description: Added text shadow to chat text for better readability
Increased chat text size

list.subtitle: Stats
description: Battle Royale - Leaving the game early before your death counts towards your total number of games played (It's fine to leave before the game starts)
Capture The Gems - Leaving the game before it finishes counts towards your total number of games played (Joining/leaving the same game multiple times only counts as 1 game played)
Capture The Gems - Stats are not saved if the game has less than 6 players (always been this way)

list.subtitle: Bug Fixes
description: Fixed an issue related to playing the correct block footstep sound

list.subtitle: Miscellaneous
description: Implemented various staff tools
Capture The Gems - You won't be placed into a game where there are only less than 5 minutes left

list.subtitle: Weapons
description: Added the Compact Submachine Gun
Increased effective range of submachine guns
Decreased minimum damage of submachine guns

list.subtitle: Capture The Gems
description: Added a ceiling to the gem towers to prevent camping inside of them
You are not supposed to go on the gem towers...but in case you do and get stuck there, there is a cactus that you can kill yourself with

list.subtitle: Balance
description: Increased cactus damage to 25 per second (used to be 15 per 2 seconds)

list.subtitle: Bug Fixes
description: Fixed another wall clipping / x-ray exploit

list.subtitle: Engine
description: Modular plugin support (took a lot of effort)

list.subtitle: Capture The Gems
description: You can no longer build near the gem towers
Removed the ceilings of gem towers, so people can't just camp there

list.subtitle: Bug Fixes
description: Made Block editing cancellation feedback more "instant"

list.subtitle: Capture The Gems
description: Team gems are now stored in unbreakable gem towers
Both teams can build around the team gems
Fun trivia: The gem towers are made out of new unbreakable blocks: Bedrock Bricks, reinforced ruby, and reinforced sapphire

list.subtitle: Settings
description: Added settings to hide chat

list.subtitle: Inventory
description: Only ammos for the guns you own are picked up automatically

list.subtitle: Bug Fixes
description: You can no longer join the same game multiple times using the same account

list.subtitle: Optimizations
description: The game should no longer lag when a huge structure is destroyed

list.subtitle: Stats
description: Added player stats page (e.g. https://voxiom.io/player/ThriveR)

list.subtitle: Bug Fixes
description: Fixed matchmaking server crash

list.subtitle: UI
description: You can now change settings outside of the game
Game pages are now linkable (e.g. https://voxiom.io/leaderboard)
Removed news page (merged with this page)

list.subtitle: Leaderboard
description: Battle royale leaderboard is now sortable by kills, games won, or survival time
Capture the gems leaderboard is now sortable by kills, games won, or captures

list.subtitle: Bug Fixes
description: Fixed ghost items

list.subtitle: Battle Royale
description: Added sound cue to indicate that toxic fog has started shrinking
Made "Run! The toxic fog is shrinking" hud text color orange

list.subtitle: Miscellaneous
description: Fixed bullets of Light Submachine Gun going through walls
Weapons and tools dropped by other players now have the owner's player name as part of the item name

list.subtitle: Battle Royale
description: You no longer see your own name tag
Parachute closes correctly when you land in water
Added boulders

list.subtitle: Miscellaneous
description: Fixed loadout station item duplication exploit
Fixed wall clipping exploit

list.subtitle: Map
description: New map with 7 major point of interests and 3 minor locations to explore!
The map will be continuously updated (regular content updates, events, feedback)
More importantly, the foundation of custom map building allows more custom maps / map changes in the future

list.subtitle: Balance
description: Increased lobby time
Slightly increased storm time
Doubled survival exp
Kill exp is now based on scores (like in CTG)
Greatly increased win exp

list.subtitle: Bug Fixes
description: Fixed surge assault rifle client prediction

list.subtitle: Servers
description: Fixed a major server performance issue

list.subtitle: Building
description: If a block placement is cancelled, the blocks are refunded to you

list.subtitle: Audio
description: Made digging sound more consistent
Decreased audio debounce time, so you don't miss some audio as often

list.subtitle: Weapons
description: Added the Surge Assault Rifle, a powerful 3-bullet burst weapon
Increased the fire rate of the light submachine gun

list.subtitle: Crafting
description: Increased the size of the crafting and loadout icons
Made the crafting list scrollable

list.subtitle: Servers
description: Added servers in US east coast (New York City)
Fixed an issue that caused players in Asia to be put into European servers and vice-versa(lol oops)

list.subtitle: Bug Fixes
description: Fixed a memory leak
Replaced light submachine gun sound to fix audio clipping

list.subtitle: Crafting
description: New crafting recipe: 1 rock -> 9 stone bricks
Increased all stone bricks hardness to 4.0 units

list.subtitle: Performance
description: Doubled item entities' auto merge radius

list.subtitle: Models
description: Fixed tactical assault rifle's model

list.subtitle: Accounts
description: Nickname uniqueness is now case-insensitive.
For the existing duplicated names, only the first account who took the nickname gets to keep it. The others are given another chance at naming themselves

list.subtitle: Crosshair
description: Added new crosshair style: Dot

list.subtitle: Building
description: Fixed building mode visual glitch after respawning
Fixed floating blocks chain destruction animation

list.subtitle: Building
description: You can now build stairs
For places where you cannot build (either not enough materials or there are players in the way), a red highlight will always be shown
Building now ignores item switch cooldown (You can swap out blocks and build instantly)

list.subtitle: Items
description: Default max item stack size has been increased to 255

list.subtitle: Blocks
description: Increased cactus collision damage to 15 per second

list.subtitle: Capture The Gems
description: You can now build near your team's gem temple, so you can't get stuck in holes dug by the enemies
Fixed a bug where the enemy can kill a gem block permanently by shooting the blocks below it
Made team spawn bigger and have two gates

list.subtitle: Performance
description: Optimized server chunks management

list.subtitle: Settings
description: Crosshair config
You can now change the width, length, colors, and style of the crosshair
Currently there are two styles available: Cross & Cross With Dot

list.subtitle: Capture The Gems
description: Loadout station no longer clears your entire inventory. Instead, it swaps your primary, and then gives you other items if you don't have them already.

list.subtitle: Bug Fixes
description: Fixed ghost items bug (items that can't be picked up)
Items no longer disappear when thrown on the edge of the world
Fixed respawning on the edge of the world

list.subtitle: Medals
description: Added 5 more medals
Revenge: Killed someone who just killed you (+5)
First blood: First kill of the match (+20)
Attacker: Killed someone while having the gem (+5)
Defender: Killed someone who has the gem (+10)
Capture: Captured the gem! (+250)
Renamed description of assist to "Participated in killing an enemy" for consistency

list.subtitle: Bug Fixes
description: Fixed Twitch avatar icons' height
You can no longer get assists on teammates

list.subtitle: Bug Fix
description: Fixed an issue that causes the game to be more laggy as you play

list.subtitle: Miscellaneous
description: Added featured streams section. Stream voxiom.io to automatically get featured on the front page!
Added link to twitch in community section

list.subtitle: Bug Fixes
description: Fixed inventory UI not updating correctly when closing it by clicking outside of it
Fixed the "DIVER" medal, the killer should be in water, not the victim
Fixed block modification client prediction

list.subtitle: Medals
description: A reward system that gives you additional points under certain conditions
Currently there are 6 medals in the game:
Brawler: Melee kill (+10 points)
Headshot: Killed someone with a headshot (+5 points)
Survivor: Killed someone while being low on health (+2 points)
Juggernaut: Killed someone while being high on health and shield (+2 points)
Assist: Assisted a teammate in killing an enemy (+2 points)
Diver: Killed someone while in water (+2 points)
More medals such as revenge, first blood, attacker, defender, and other non-kill-based medals, are coming soon!

list.subtitle: Capture The Gems
description: Raised the height of river bed. Now there's enough space to dig under water
Added desert biome

list.subtitle: Bug Fixes
description: Hitbox fixed for crouching players. You can now properly headshot them
You can no longer see through walls when digging
Fixed player active item not updating after respawn
Fixed block item usage tip not updating after respawn

title: Balance, Quality of Life & Bug Fixes

list.subtitle: Capture The Gems
description: Nametags are shown for your teammates

list.subtitle: Bug Fixes
description: Melee attack now uses raycast. You can no longer melee enemy through walls
Leaves with berries and loadout station are now breakable by fists
Better text shadow for notifications text

list.subtitle: Balance
description: Shovel efficiency has been buffed significantly
Block break sound has a shorter falloff range
You can now place blocks / switch block placement modes while sprinting

list.subtitle: Capture The Gems
description: Fixed server shutting down randomly
Fixed sometimes not able to find servers

title: Performance & Balance
description: Tactical assault rifle had more damage per second as well as less recoil compared to the combat assault rifle. The burst shotgun became too powerful since the previous update. The light submachine gun was rarely used due to its low damage. This update aims to make each weapon shine in their own way.

list.subtitle: Balance
description: Slightly increased the damage of light submachine gun
Slightly decreased the damage of tactical assault rifle
Decreased bullets per shot of burst shotgun to 9
Slightly decreased the damage of burst shotgun
Items on ground now despawn after 1 minute instead of 30 seconds

list.subtitle: Capture The Gems
description: Made spawn gate bigger in Capture The Gems
Players in spawn can no longer take damage
Removed the chests on the spawn towers

list.subtitle: Performance
description: Fixed 2 texture memory leaks

list.subtitle: Performance
description: Optimized all models in game

list.subtitle: Balance
description: Extended match time of capture the gems to 20 minutes
Decreased team score reward of gem capture to 30 points
Increased clip size of burst shotgun to 6
Increased bullets per shot of burst shotgun to 10
Increased damage of light submachine gun by 1 (per shot)

list.subtitle: Bug Fix
description: Fixed an issue where Google Translate breaks the game hud UI

list.subtitle: Capture The Gems
description: Added XP bar at the game end screen
Made berries a bit more common

list.subtitle: Capture The Gems
description: New game mode released!
Added stats tracking
You can no longer spam gem pickup alerts
Added chat type in front of player names in chat
You can send a match-wide chat by using the /all command
Fixed ghost player models showing up for dead players in some cases

list.subtitle: Battle Royale
description: Increased the length of the grace periods of the first 4 toxic fog times

list.subtitle: Balance
description: Maximum stack size of red berries and oranges berries are increased to 12

list.subtitle: Leaderboard
description: We now have 3 different types of leaderboard: level, battle royale, and capture the gems

list.subtitle: Test the game mode Capture The Ores here!
New Items and Blocks
description: New block: Leaves with red berries
New block: Leaves with orange berries
New item: red berries, restores 25 (up to 50) health points
New item: orange berries, restores 25 (up to 25) shield points
New recipe: 3 red berries + 1 emerald gem = 2 medicine pills
New recipe: 6 red berries + 2 emerald gem = 1 first aid kit
New recipe: 3 orange berries + 1 emerald gem = 2 mini shield potion
New recipe: 4 orange berries + 1 emerald gem = 1 advanced shield potion
New recipe: 6 orange berries + 2 emerald gem = 1 ultimate shield potion

list.subtitle: Balance
description: Shovels no longer have a durability limit
Increased the melee damage of upgraded shovels
Greatly increased the efficiency of upgraded shovels
Increased the hardness of einforced iron blocks
Reduced drop rate of health/shield regen items in chests
Reduced consumption time of advanced shield potion to 3 seconds
Reduced consumption time of ultimate shield potion to 5 seconds
Reduced consumption time of first aid kit to 5 seconds

list.subtitle: Buildings
description: Added stairs to third floor of castle towers

list.subtitle: Capture The Gems
description: Added 4 more towers on each side of the river
Increased game time to 15 minutes
Make chat team only
Spawn Protection: Your own team's spawn heals you 20 health points every second
Spawn Protection: The enemy team's spawn damages you for 20 health points every second
Test the game mode here!

list.subtitle: Battle Royale
description: Disabled chat

list.subtitle: Miscellaneous
description: Reduced chat spam timeout to 30 seconds
Chat UI no longer shows when chat is disabled
Fixed UI flashing randomly when consuming items
Added Facebook login method
Fixed screen shaking at game disconnection screen
Reduced item floating amplitude, so the bottom highlight doesn't go underground
New Capture the Gems game mode can be tested at here
Slightly increased render distance (by 1 chunk)
Added icons for health and shield bars
Shortened game start time
Shortened and tweaked toxic fog time
Toxic fog now damages players every 2 seconds instead of 1
New and cleaner style for hud alert text
Added color support for hud alert text
Re-enabled chat for level 5 and above
New initial chunk loading screen
Much faster chunk loading performance in game
Added stairs, additional doors, and second floor access to stone castles
Slightly decreased movement modifier for combat assault rifle and tactical assault rifle
Slightly increased auto climbing speed
Re-textured wood blocks
Sprinting allows you to step up one block automatically
Crouching prevents you from falling off edges
Disabled chat to prevent abuse :(

list.subtitle: Miscellaneous
description: Made cactus damage you on collision
Improved lag compensation
Made swimming movement smoother in water
Made Water flow faster
Fixed item pick up animation visual bug

list.subtitle: Balance
description: Reduced medicine pill usage time from 3 seconds to 2 seconds
Reduced first aid kit usage time from 10 seconds to 6 seconds
Reduced mini shield potion usage time from 3 seconds to 2 seconds
Reduced advanced shield potion usage time from 6 seconds to 4 seconds
Reduced ultimate shield potion usage time from 10 seconds to 6 seconds
Added one more final circle that shrinks the battle field to 2 blocks radius
Max toxic fog damage reduced to 5

list.subtitle: Miscellaneous
description: Initial terrain loading is now synchronous and therefore faster
You can no longer use regen items while sprinting
The full inventory view now shows your active slot and hides the quick inventory view to avoid confusion
Added a background color to health bar and shield bar for clarity
Made chat filter more advanced

list.subtitle: Miscellaneous
description: Terrains are flatter
Crouching no longer triggers movement sound
Fixed entity teleportation visual bug

list.subtitle: Miscellaneous
description: Added 2 more toxic fog which reduce the playing area to 5 units to prevent camping
Improved game over screen
Reduced fall damage by 20%
Chunk loading improvements
Netcode: entity interpolation improvements
Fix ammo pickup logic
Better matchmaking algorithm
Various backend server improvements

list.subtitle: Movement
description: Made player collider thinner so it's easier to get in 1-block holes
Slightly increased jump height
Increased ground friction to make movement less slippery
Increased air control

list.subtitle: Matchmaking
description: Backend infrastructure has been improved to allow multi-gamemodes in the future

list.subtitle: Social
description: Added various roles to discord server
Added a subreddit /r/Voxiom

title: Performance
description: Major performance optimizations have been implemented

list.subtitle: Gameplay
description: You can now hold space to jump continuously
Castles always generate at the 3 locations
Added 4 gates to castles so you don't get trapped easily
If a castle spawns on the desert, it becomes a sandstone castle

title: Performance
description: Various performance optimizations have been implemented

list.subtitle: Inventory Management
description: You can now use the interact key to open the work station for crafting
Removed the original crafting mechanic where you need to stand close to a work station to craft

list.subtitle: UI
description: Made first person damage indicator bigger

list.subtitle: Inventory Management
description: Ammos are automatically picked up
Items are automatically picked up if you already have an item stack with the same items that's not full
If you try to pick up an item with empty hands, it goes straight to your active slot

list.subtitle: Chat
description: Chat has been turned on with filters

list.subtitle: Inventory Management
description: Removed keys for selecting next/prev slot
Added interact key to pick up / swap items
Items must be manually picked up by looking at them and press the interact key (defaults to E)
You can now exit the inventory by clicking outside of the view when you don't have any items on the cursor

list.subtitle: Gameplay
description: You are given 45 blocks of dirt on dropoff
Item drops bounce more, so they don't clutter when you try to pick them up

list.subtitle: UI
description: Temporarily disabled chat due to toxicity
All key hints now show the actual one saved in settings
Typing in chat no longer triggers key binds

title: Balance
description: The last update probably made the gas a little too fast, so we are reverting the changes a bit

list.subtitle: Toxic Gas
description: Increased match time to 6.5 minutes
Increased number of toxic gas from 4 to 5

title: Balance and Performance
description: The goal of this update is to make the game more fast paced and more fun to play. Some performance optimizations should also help the game to run on low end laptops.

list.subtitle: Toxic Gas
description: Reduced match time from 7 minutes to 4.5 minutes
Reduced number of toxic gas from 6 to 4
Toxic gas now shrink a bit faster, but you should still be able to outrun the first 2

list.subtitle: Crafting
description: Drastically reduced crafting cost of all gun upgrades
Increased crafting yield of reinforced iron and wood (1:9)
Increased crafting cost of work station to 30 wood, but it's actually easier to craft because you can craft 9 wood from 1 log now

list.subtitle: Regen
description: Made medicine pills only be able to heal up to 75 health points
Made mini shield potion only be able to heal up to 75 shield points
Made all health regen items more common in crates and chests

list.subtitle: Movement
description: You jump a little lower, so you are no longer able to make a 2-block tall jump
Made gliding and freefalling faster

list.subtitle: Weapons
description: Slightly increased damage of light submachine gun
Slightly increased the range of the burst shotgun
Increased the magazine size of the burst shotgun to 5

list.subtitle: Performance
description: Reduced client and server update rate for better performance. The game should still feel the same
Fixed random jitter movement especially during gliding/freefalling due to client misprediction

list.subtitle: UI
description: New game menu UI
Added a leaderboard based on levels

list.subtitle: Accounts
description: You can now login with your Google accounts

list.subtitle: Accounts
description: The account system is now live! Currently you can login with Discord. We will be adding more social login methods very soon!
Once you are logged in, your stats such as kills, deaths, games won, levels, and xp will be saved
Chat has been re-enabled for players with level 5 and above
Your level is shown together with your username in chat
On completion of each match, your stats will be updated

Experience points are awarded per match based on your kills (x10 multiplier), time survived (in seconds, x0.1 multiplier), and rank (up to 500 points per win based on the number of players in the match)

list.subtitle: Balance Update
description: Doubled shovel durability
Increased last circle's preparation time by 10 seconds
Nerfed combat assault rifle's damage by 4
Slightly increased tactical assault rifle's recoil

list.subtitle: Bug Fixes
description: Fixed a server crashing bug

list.subtitle: Toxic Fog
description: Now has up to 6 circles in total per match
Made the first few toxic fog circles much slower. You can actually outrun them now
Due to the above 2 changes, each match is 90 seconds longer
Now skips over shield and damages health directly

list.subtitle: Map
description: Removed golden chests
Reduced spawn rate of silver chests
Boulders and ores spawn much more frequent
Ores drop more gems

list.subtitle: Crafting
description: Reduced crafting cost of all guns
Made epic and legendary tier guns craftable (You can only get them this way now)
Common shovel no longer needs workbench
Changed reinforced iron recipe to 1 iron ingot -> 3 reinforced iron blocks
You can now craft the same item continuously by continuously clicking the same recipe (before you had to move the crafted item to an inventory slot)

list.subtitle: Miscellaneous
description: Removed "You are lagging too hard" kick. A better alternative has been implemented

list.subtitle: Settings
description: You can now adjust sound volume

list.subtitle: Matchmaking
description: Reduced the likelihood of getting "This game has already started" when joining a game

list.subtitle: Miscellaneous
description: Added this page

list.subtitle: Map
description: Forests are bigger and less dense
Plains are bigger
New location: Stone castle village. One on the training island for fun, one on the battle island

list.subtitle: Miscellaneous
description: You get 99 dirt on training island for fun
Made final circle bigger

list.subtitle: Bug Fixes
description: You can now use healing items while in toxic fog
Fixed crosshair not showing up for some people (many thanks to @Catwhiskers 144 for testing!)

list.subtitle: Performance Optimizations
description: Fixed an issue burning unnecessary CPU cycles
Added a "Render Scale" option in settings. Try decreasing it to increase your FPS!

list.subtitle: UI & Controls
description: Added map toggle key (defaults to M)
You can now change all keybinds (pause menu -> settings -> change controls)
Added "Invert mouse wheel" option in settings. This reverts the mouse wheel for item slots selection
Fixed the conflict between pause menu and inventory. You can no longer open the map/inventory while in pause menu
Fixed getting stuck in "Finding a Match..."
Added "Invert Y Axis" option in settings
You can now resume the game by clicking anywhere on the screen
Changed default sensitivity to 5
Decreased toxic fog damage
The server now broadcasts tips in chat every 2 minutes
Added controls info and news panel on welcome screen
Buffed every weapon's block damage
